About me

A few things about me

Bio

I am a software and systems engineering student, eager to learn new things by day. I am punctual and friendly, love working in a team that can share as much knowledge or experience as possible. I am easy going, but I tend to pay attention closely to details so that they fit my tastes.

As a side note, this project will sum up my love for ducks in order to add my touch to it.

Robotics

Member of Autovortex

I have been a member of Romania's Natioanal Robotics Team between 2018-2020. I have worked as a mechanic, assembling the robot part by part along with a couple other teammates. We have participated in competitions worldwide and won most of the awards, anywhere from the USA to South Korea.

Student

Software engineering student at LUT

I have started my bachelor's degree in 2022, at LUT, Finland. Prior to this, I have studied at National College of Computer Science 'Tudor Vianu', which made me believe I should follow my career in this field.

Tutor

LUT tutor

As a side job I applied to be a tutor for the newcomers of 2023 at LUT. Not only have I seen this as a way to make some money in order to sustain myself a bit, but also to get a kind of experience in the working industry.
